channel.title: Hidan's scythe v2
channel.description:
i did everything you guys wanted in improving it and made it look better i looked up a pic of it :P
pic [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/14j5442.jpg[/img]
dl http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?g2eouayd022
ints [code]if(i == 11115) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 10000; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 10001; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 10001; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Hidan's Scythe"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Hidan's Deadly Scythe".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]

item.title: Hidan's scythe v2

You sir, have made my day, and are claimed a god.
